mapper.select: SELECT EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_NM AS areaNm /* 지역 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AS areaCd /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD AS cityCd /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_NM AS areaNm /* 지역 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.COORD_Y AS coordY /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.COORD_X AS coordX /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.DISP_ORDER AS dispOrder /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.USE_YN AS useYn /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_AREA_CD.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD = #{param.areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = #{param.cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
ORDER BY EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_AREA_CD SET /* 지역 코드 */ AREA_NM = #{areaNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 명, VARCHAR2(50) */ ,COORD_Y = #{coordY, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 위도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,COORD_X = #{coordX, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 경도, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,DISP_ORDER = #{dispOrder, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정렬순서, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 사용 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ WHERE 1=1 AND AREA_CD = #{areaCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지역 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND CITY_CD = #{cityCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 도시 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
